mapper.insert: insert into freeboard(num, team, name, title, content, regdate) values(freeboard_seq.nextval, #{team}, #{name}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update freeboard set name=#{name}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, regDate=sysdate where num = #{num}

insert into freeboardReply(replynum, num, empno, reply, regDate, sort, parent, child) values(#{replynum}, #{num}, #{empno}, #{reply}, sysdate, 1, #{replynum}, freeboardReReply_seq.nextval)
